panels.description: Lloc on es troba situat el Centre i si es situa damunt el punt es poden observar els sensors que conté.

targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM iotib2.centros where Name = "Center 2"

panels.title: CENTER 2

targets.rawSql: select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;

panels.description: Mesura el percentatge de temps en què detecta presència en un rang de 8 m.

targets.rawSql: select presence from adeunis_payload join data on data.id = adeunis_payload.id where FormatType = "5C" and data.dev_eui ="00-18-b2-60-00-00-04-7f" order by trx_time desc limit 1;
select humidity from milesight_payload join data on data.id = milesight_payload.id where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-78-5d-12-43-02" order by trx_time desc limit 1

panels.description: Mesura subjectiva representativa de la percepció humana expressada com al 100% de llum

targets.rawSql: select luminosity from adeunis_payload join data on data.id = adeunis_payload.id where FormatType = "5C" and data.dev_eui ="00-18-b2-60-00-00-04-7f" order by trx_time desc limit 1;

panels.description: Avisa si el sensor ha detectat moviment, i avisa quan deixa de detectarlo.

targets.rawSql: select AlarmState,PresenceState from adeunis_payload join data on data.id = adeunis_payload.id where (FormatType = "5D" or FormatType ="5C") and data.dev_eui ="00-18-b2-60-00-00-04-7f" order by trx_time desc limit 1;

panels.title: Motion_Sensor

targets.rawSql: select temperature from milesight_payload join data on data.id = milesight_payload.id where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-78-5d-12-43-02" order by trx_time desc limit 1;
select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;
select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;
select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where tipo_dec = '01' and dev_eui ="24-e1-24-78-5d-12-43-02" order by trx_time desc limit 1;
select trx_time, humidity from data join milesight_payload on data.id = milesight_payload.id  where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-78-5d-12-43-02"
select trx_time, temperature from data join milesight_payload on data.id = milesight_payload.id  where (tipo_dec='01' or tipo_dec='03') and data.dev_eui ="24-e1-24-78-5d-12-43-02"
select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;

panels.description: Calcul de paquets perduts, del detector de presència interior, de cada mes, limitant-se als 6 darrers mesos.

targets.rawSql: SELECT porcentajePaquetesPerdidos,periodo FROM iotib2.paquetesperdidos where dev_eui = "00-18-b2-60-00-00-04-7f" limit 6

panels.title: Indoor_Motion_Sensor

targets.rawSql: select trx_time,presence from adeunis_payload join data on data.id = adeunis_payload.id where FormatType = "5C" and data.dev_eui ="00-18-b2-60-00-00-04-7f" order by trx_time desc ;
select trx_time,luminosity from adeunis_payload join data on data.id = adeunis_payload.id where FormatType = "5C" and data.dev_eui ="00-18-b2-60-00-00-04-7f" order by trx_time desc ;

panels.description: Calcul de paquets perduts, del medidor de temperatura i humitat interior, de cada mes, limitant-se als 6 darrers mesos.

targets.rawSql: SELECT porcentajePaquetesPerdidos,periodo FROM iotib2.paquetesperdidos where dev_eui = "24-e1-24-78-5d-12-43-02" limit 6

panels.title: Indoor_Temperature_Humidity_Sensor

targets.rawSql: select  milesight_payload.BatteryLevel from data join milesight_payload ON data.ID = milesight_payload.ID where milesight_payload.Tipo_dec = '01' order by trx_time desc limit 1;

panels.description: Descriu el percentatge de les diferents taxes de transmissió dels uplinks de tots els  medidors que hi ha al centre.

targets.rawSql: SELECT data_rate,count(data_rate) from data where (dev_eui = "00-18-b2-60-00-00-04-7f" or dev_eui = "24-e1-24-78-5d-12-43-02") and direction = "up" and port != '0' GROUP BY data_rate

panels.title: Data_Rate

panels.description: Relació senyal-soroll de les senyals transmeses pels uplinks dels dispositius del centre.

targets.rawSql: SELECT trx_time,SNR FROM data where (dev_eui = "00-18-b2-60-00-00-04-7f" or dev_eui = "24-e1-24-78-5d-12-43-02") and direction ="up" and  port != '0'

panels.title: SNR

panels.description: Detecta presència en detectar moviment i com més a prop del dispositiu estigui, major serà el valor que proporcioni el sensor i viceversa.

targets.rawSql: SELECT trx_time,RSSI_UP FROM data where (dev_eui = "24-e1-24-78-5d-12-43-02" or dev_eui = "00-18-b2-60-00-00-04-7f") and direction ="up" and  port != '0'

panels.title: RSSI
